a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Gini index of income in 2015 vs. 1990
Where income surveys are not available, figures are estimated based on consumption surveys.
Data source: Global Consumption and Income Project; HYDE (2023); Gapminder (2022); UN WPP (2024)
